verse: The word of the Lord that came to Hosea the son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.
When the Lord began to speak by Hosea, the Lord said to Hosea:
So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim, and she conceived and bore him a son.
Then the Lord said to him:
And she conceived again and bore a daughter. Then God said to him:
Now when she had weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she conceived and bore a son.
